phrases: My mother died because of you!
If you devils never existed, she would still be alive!
You are weaker than I thought.
I think she blew your lung out.
If you do not do something, you are going to die.
You have lost a lot of blood, and you got to fix that lung.
I guess I can give you this.
Since we are repairing organs, you will need, what, like 200cc?
Nothing works better than human blood, after all.
Are you a friend of his?
I am just a passing life-saver.
Shared my human blood with him, that is all.
Oh, do not get any funny ideas.
You expect me to take a devil at his word?
He tricked my mother into thinking he loved her!
Then he drank the blood from her dead body,
You know, I think you are looking at this all the wrong way.
What I am getting is that your mom's boyfriend was a slimeball,
and he also happened to be a devil, that is all.
It takes more than one factor in someone is life to drive them to crime.
The environment they grow up in, what attracts their interest, who is around them.
All of these factors join together in a complex pattern to create that foundation.
treating someone like a potential criminal just because they are a devil is way too simplistic.
If he were not a devil, he would never have done those terrible things!
People do terrible things, too, you know.
Can I... Can I... Can I... Who am I...?
Kimi wa boku o dou omou no ka?
Futari wa ikite yuku no ka?
Then Anzai ran off by himself?
We need to find Anzai, and fast!
So you are saying Anzai did not lick your wound, correct?
Maybe if Anzai sees me, he will come back to his senses?
You know he wears that ring, right?
I am using it to monitor him, keep track of his temperature, in case of an emergency.
And this sound is the alarm that goes off when he gets above 102 degrees.
There is only one thing that could have this effect on a devil.
He must have ingested a large quantity of human blood!
If his temp keeps going up like this,
the fever will affect his brain and internal organs, and lead to permanent damage.
Worst case scenario, he might die.
We have to find him and stop him before that happens.
I have never seen this happen before, either.
His wounds are healed, but now the blood's totally gone to his head.
but it is possible that the sniper is identifying vampires by their body temperatures.
With thermography, you could tell at a glance.
And you are absolutely certain Anzai's had some blood?
I did not believe it at first, either.
But it is possible that resisting the urge to drink Taira's blood has amplified his bloodlust.
If he did drink blood, we will have to bring out the tranquilizers.
A sedative is a medicine, but a tranquilizer is a weapon.
Only police are allowed to use them, on devil suspects who have lost control.
We have to help whoever he got that blood from.
Lots of devils go after young women, so...
Do not drink her blood, Anzai!
I am fighting the wanted sniper and someone we assume to be an accomplice!
Suspect is armed with what appears to be a rifle!
Hey, I told you to wait at the-
Do not give me that crap!
You want me to sit around and wait while my coworker gets himself killed?
Sorry for eavesdropping, but I heard it all.
Only a devil can fight off another devil.
If you do not use me now, then why even have devils on the team?
She cannot even get near him.
Is she the one that shot Anzai?
But it does not look like he drank her blood...
Then whose blood did he drink?
I gave him some human blood to drink.
He was dying, shot right through the chest.
And now I do not have any blood left for me.
And what is with your eye?
Then he is just like Anzai.
He would not happen to be from Hokkaido, would he?
To think I would run into another hybrid in the outside world.
Not even a devil can stop him?
The difference between a devil on human blood and one who is not is like night and day.
I was just trying to heal him.
I did not think it would turn into this.
Even I could not have seen this coming.
Well, what is done is done.
I guess that is what happens when you drink blood without building up a tolerance.
If we do not do something, Anzai will...
We have found one of the suspects described in the witness report!
I do not think I really want to hang out with the police.
We are moving to Plan B.
Anzai stopped coming to see me.
And how is it going with your crush?
Of course he is not calling me.
I never gave him my phone number or email address.
I know it is late, but Merry Christmas.
Why will not he come back?
This is the last place I saw him.
It is the only place I can think of where I might see him.
So hey, did you see a cross?
I think I dropped it somewhere around here the other day.
He has not come to see me since then, and I have no way to contact him.
I mean, you jumped in front of a rampaging devil.
Try putting yourself in his shoes!
It is not uncommon for a devil to lose it and kill their significant other.
Then they either kill themselves in despair or fall down dark paths.
I have only been thinking of myself.
I do not know anything about Anzai.
I really do not know anything.
But if I keep talking to him, maybe I can learn some things.
Can I see your left eye?
This eye does not scare you?
The guy I like is a devil.
If I tell him I like him, too... maybe we could start dating.
Wait, so, he is just waiting for you to get back to him?
When are you going to tell him?
Oh right, you have no way to contact him.
I think he is bothered by what happened two weeks ago.
That was the most devil-like I would ever seen him...
How long are you going to hole up in there?
We are meeting at the bar downstairs at 6pm.
If you are that worried about it, you can wear this.
He is afraid he is going to lose it and hurt someone.
So that is a tool to help ease that anxiety.
Come to think of it, does not it bother you?
Then what if he trained to get a tolerance for blood?
See, I drink a little bit of human blood every day.
But is it really okay for you to do that?
I said just a little at a time, to get my body used to it.
That way, it is easier for me to resist the urge to feed on others.
So I can see or even taste blood and still maintain my sanity.
So the other day, when Anzai survived that gunshot wound, it was because...
I ask a bunch of people to share a little with me.
That way it is not too hard on any one person, you know?
I never would have thought of that.
Want me to help you find this Anzai?
There are not a whole lot of half-devils out there, and I would like to talk to him.
And then, maybe I can initiate him into the art of blood tolerance.
I have never seen a tearful smile before.
Anzai, there is a way to build up a tolerance for blood.
Would that make things a little easier for you?
This time, I will be the one...
to tell him I like him.
I am here at the fountain plaza.
We had just a little bit of sun today.
And tomorrow, we will finally be getting some more snow.
Now let us take a look at the national forecast.
We are not going to see a real rise in temperature, which means it is going to be a cold day.
So everyone, I hope you will all stay warm, and good night.
But this is a live broadcast!
Kegareta sugata ga boku de aru koto o
It is story of fight together
It is story of desire forever
Sotto futari tokete yuku you ni...
